section.title: Overview
section.para: JBoss Developer Studio 6.0.0 is a major release of the Eclipse based IDE developed and supported by Red Hat (the visual tooling components are supported for 3 years, and the runtime platform for 5 years). The IDE, which is available for Windows, Linux and OS X, provides tooling that allows for rapid Web 2.0 application development on the JBoss Enterprise Application Platform.
